alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 6:37AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prairie, northwestern Lonoke, southwestern White and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 715 AM CST... At 637 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Little Rock AFB, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville... Cabot... Searcy... Little Rock AFB... Beebe... Ward... Austin in Lonoke County... Thurman... Old Austin... Parnell... McRae... Sylvania... South Bend... Garner... Antioch in White County... Vinity Corner... Macon... Hayley... Butlerville... Hickory Plains... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CST for central Arkansas.
